name: Air Force X
description:
Hello! I am a solo and indie developer. I'm still new in game development and my ambition is to become a game developer.  I developed Air Force X game as my Final Year Project in Bachelor in Interactive Multimedia Design. Since that, I discovered that I have a strong passion in game development. I distributed Air Force X game for my relatives and close friends and got many positive reviews. So I decided to share Air Force X game online for public.

The purpose of this game is to promote awareness about hazardous chemicals all around us and the effect to our body

Please try my game and any feedbacks or donations are highly appreciated. Thank you!

Asset used : https://www.gameart2d.com/game-gui-2.html

Music background used:

That Floor by Stonza Photography

Game Music by Peder B. Helland

Cipher by Kevin MacLeod http://incompetech.com
Creative Commons — Attribution 4.0 International — CC BY 4.0
